description: After your creatures with Burning are killed, they have a 25% chance to be resurrected with 20% Health. This trait does not stack.

name: Roll the Dice
description: At the end of this creature's turn, it Casts one of its Ethereal Spell Gems.

name: Scared Stiff
description: After an enemy is afflicted with Snared or Feared, this creature afflicts them with whichever of these debuffs the target doesn't already have.

name: Scheming Stance
description: After this creature Defends, 3 enemies are affliected with Feared.

name: Screech of Domination
description: After this creature Attacks, it gains copies of the enemy's minions.

name: Seed of Potentiality
description:
After this creature gains a stat, it gains the same amount of another stat (other than Health).
The stats gained from this trait do not activate effects that occur whenn stats are gained.

name: Seethe
description: This creature deals 10% more damage for each time it has taken damage in the current battle.

name: Sharpnel Blast
description: After an enemy takes damage at the start of its turn from Bomb, all other enemies take 30% of that damage as well. This trait does not stack.

name: Shattering Tackle
description:
Your creatures' attacks ignore 2.5% of the enemies' Defense for each Yeti creature fighting on your side.
This bonus is doubled if the enemy is afflicted with Frozen. This trait does not stack.

name: Shining Armor
description: While your creatures have Barrier, they have 40% more Defense. This trait does not stack.

name: Snack Break
description: At the start of this creature's turn, it recovers 200% Health and loses 20% Speed.

name: Sobered Up
description: Your creatures can manually Cast Booze Spells.

name: Soul Steal
description: After this creature Attacks, its Spell Gem with the lowest number of remaining Charges gains 1 Charge.

name: Spin the Wheel
description: Whenever it is an enemy's turn, any random effects that fail to occur are re-rolled an additional time. This trait does not stack.

name: Spontaneous Entropy
description: At the end of this creature's turn, its Ethereal Spell Gems are replaced with different ones.

name: Squadron Leader
description: This creature has 15% more stats (other than Health) for each minion it has.

name: Sting Martyr
description: This creature's attacks deal 100% more damage. After this creature Attacks, it loses 10% Maximum Health.

name: Sugar Rush
description: When this creature Casts a spell, the spell has 20% more potency for each buff it has. At the end of this creature's turn, its buffs are removed.

name: Superfluidity
description: When your creatures automatically Cast a spell, they have a 5% chance to be considered manual casts. This trait does not stack.

name: Sustain
description: After this creature deals damage, it recovers Health equal to 5% of the damage dealt.

name: Swarming Horde
description: Your creatures have 3% more stats (other than Health) for each creature of their same race fighting on your side. This trait does not stack.

name: Swelling Ranks
description: After this creature Provokes, it grants copies of one of its minions to your other creatures.

name: Sword of Will
description: After this creature Attacks, and the damage exceeds 300% of the target's lowest stat, it is killed.

name: Synthesis
description: After your creatures gain a minion, they gain 30% of their highest stat. This trait does not stack.

name: The Best Medicine
description: When one of your creatures would be afflicted with a debuff, they have a 20% chance to afflict a random enemy with that debuff instead. This trait does not stack.

name: The King Is Dead
description: After one of your creatures is healed, this creature has a 20% chance to be resurrected with 50% Health.

name: The Shadows
description: After this creature is killed for the first time in battle, it is resurrected with 20% Health and gains 50% Attack and Intelligence.

name: Toxic Cloud
description: After an enemy Attacks, each other enemy has a 25% chance to be afflicted with a random debuff. This trait does not stack.

name: Toxic Karma
description: After this creature is Attacked, the enemy is afflicted with Poisoned and Bomb.

name: Training Matrix
description: After your creatures are resurrected, they gain 20% stats. This trait does not stack.

name: Tribe Mentality
description: At the start of battle, creatures adjacent to this creature change their class to match this creature's class.

name: True Strike
description: This creature's attacks ignore 25% of enemies' Defense and act as if this creature is strong against the enemy's class.

name: Undead Legion
description: Your creatures can have 3 additional stacks of Zombies. This trait does not stack.

name: Unrelenting Fury
description: This creature deals 100% more damage while it is below 40% Health.

name: Unrevealed Secret
description: After this creature dodges an attack, the enemy is afflicted with a random debuff.

name: Unstable Existence
description: After any creatures takes damage from a creature and their resulting Health is below 50%, they deal damage to their adjacent alllies equal to 100% of the damage taken. This trait does not stack.

name: Usery
description: This creature deals 125% more damage with attacks and takes 75% more damage from attacks.

name: Vengeful Rebound
description: Your creatures take 50% less damage until the start of their first turn. This trait does not stack.

name: Vicious Retaliation
description: After this creature dodges, it Attacks the enemy. This attack deals 50% more damage if this creature is Provoking.

name: Why Won't You Die?
description:
After this creature causes 0 damage with an attack or spell, it gains 12% Attack and Intelligence.
This trait does not work on damage that is completely prevented by other effects. This trait can activate a maximum of 1 time per turn.

name: Widdershins
description: Class strengths and weaknesses are reversed.
